title: do i lose items/loot from the season/rewards?
body:
i know you keep the skins etc if i change the region, and lose rank and keep mmr.
but do i keep the silver/gold/plat/diamond FRAME?

replies.body: Your borders will transfer over only after the season ends.  If you transfer before the end of the season, then you will need to do your placement matches for that region, as they have their own MMR and meta.  Let me know if you have any questions!
